title: Sans Serif extreme bold font ID needed
content:
Hey guys, a client of mine insists that this font be used in his new logo. I tried my best to convince him otherwise but no luck.

I am guessing this font is some free font somewhere but I am not sure. Whatthefont could not ID it.

Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120119050207im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Best%20Deck_4920.black%20simple.jpg)
author: retoid
